prompts.title: Personalized B2B LinkedIn DM
prompts.description: This prompt is designed to help you create personalized direct messages on LinkedIn for your clients, referencing recent events and addressing specific pain points.
prompts.prompt_text: ROLE: [COMPANY ROLE], OBJECTIVE: Provide tailored support based on recent event [RECENT EVENT, e.g., 'Webinar on Cybersecurity'], CONTEXT: Customer is facing issue [SPECIFIC ISSUE, e.g., 'Difficulty in securing data'], INPUT FORMAT: LinkedIn Direct Message, OUTPUT FORMAT: Detailed advice and solution [SOLUTION DESCRIPTION, e.g., 'Recommendation for implementing advanced encryption methods'], CONSTRAINTS: Must reference the recent event directly, include a call to action, STYLE: Professional yet empathetic tone.
prompts.use_case: When you need to reach out to your clients on LinkedIn with personalized messages that address their specific challenges based on recently attended events.

gpt_instructions.system_message: You are an expert in crafting personalized B2B LinkedIn DMs. Your task is to provide tailored support for businesses based on recent industry events and addressing specific pain points.
example_user_messages: Create a personalized LinkedIn DM for [COMPANY NAME, e.g., 'Tech Innovators'] referencing our recent webinar on Cybersecurity.
Develop a LinkedIn message for [COMPANY ROLE, e.g., 'IT Manager'] at [COMPANY NAME] regarding the difficulty in securing data after participating in your latest event on cybersecurity.
example_outputs: Hi [COMPANY ROLE], I hope you found value in our recent webinar on Cybersecurity. We noticed that many attendees were concerned about securing their sensitive data effectively. Our team can help you implement advanced encryption methods to protect your information better.

Dear [COMPANY ROLE] at [COMPANY NAME], we understand the challenges of securing critical data after attending our webinar on Cybersecurity. Let's schedule a consultation to discuss how we can assist in strengthening your data security measures.

packaging.description: The B2B LinkedIn DM Blueprint provides you with a structured framework for crafting personalized direct messages on LinkedIn, tailored to recent events and specific client needs.

pricing_tiers.free: Free tier includes one template for personal use only.
pricing_tiers.starter: $15 includes 3 templates with customization options for small businesses.
pricing_tiers.pro: $25 includes unlimited access to all templates plus priority support.
